snippet.title: Thin Threads Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Thin Threads is a first-person psychological horror game that explores how a financially struggling family’s life turns into a nightmare in just one night.

In this experience, you will step into the shoes of each family member, witnessing the story unfold from their perspectives, immersing you in a truly terrifying scenario.

The game delves into the hardships of living in extreme poverty, presenting brutal and spine-chilling moments that will leave you afraid to sleep alone after playing.

If you enjoyed our previous game, Silent Still, you’ll likely love this one too.


DOWNLOAD NOW: https://solitarystudios.itch.io/thin-threads


SOCIALS

Facebook: facebook.com/solitarystudios.official Twitter: twitter.com/SolitaryGames 
YouTube: youtube.com/SolitaryStudiosOfficial
